meanings.definition: A device that replaces a missing body part.
meanings.sent1: She uses protheses to help her walk after losing her leg in an accident.
meanings.sent2: The doctor fitted him with protheses to replace his missing arm.
meanings.sent3: The robot mistakenly grabbed the protheses thinking it was a spare part for itself.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a pair of protheses, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The protheses gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of hope and mobility.

meanings.sent1: The clinic had a display showcasing various types of protheses.
meanings.sent2: They were amazed by the collection of protheses on exhibit at the museum.
meanings.sent3: The protheses on the shelf seemed to be having a conversation of their own.
meanings.sent4: The protheses lined up neatly, resembling soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: Each of the protheses had a unique design, highlighting the diversity of options available.
